__e: Look, I know the puddings are good, but there must be more that you all desire.
And sweet, loving, kind Barry Allen that everybody likes, the Barry Allen who's just like pudding, can fix this.
Just please take your little Italian shoes and your pudding and just get out.
Get a Flamby from the fridge and go back to bed.
Hang about there for a week, come back home, make puddings and babies -- that's basically what you do, isn't it?
